entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
